attributes.action: To make the road in Spencer drive and Surrounding areas in Foxbar safe for pets
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to look at it the speed of the traffic . due to many cats been killed in our road a horse / dog  was also knocked down in the road next too our road it’s not safe for children to play or to be out on the roads !!
attributes.background: I would like the government to make a law if you hit a cat you need to stop and report it ! Also would like speed limits  or speed bumps in residential areas

rejection.details:
Traffic calming in your area is the responsibility of your local council. You can find out how to petition them here: http://www.renfrewshire.gov.uk/petitions

Roads legislation in the whole of Scotland is the responsibility of the Scottish Government. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. You can get in contact with them at petitions@scottish.parliament.uk
